name: MetaFilter Recent Activity border o' rainbows
description: Shows rainbows and clouds around your own comments in Recent Activity (for logged-in members).  Based on the user script of the same name.

user.name: rf14
user.about: The MeFi styles here are based on the user scripts I posted on GreasyFork (and before that, Userscripts.org). I made these for folks who can't install user scripts, but can install user styles for the Stylish extension. If you'd rather use scripts with Greasemonkey or Tampermonkey, visit my GreasyFork page: https://greasyfork.org/en/users/2049-rf14 If you've already installed the user scripts and are wondering what the difference is: there's really none. If you're happy with how the scripts work for you, there's no need to switch to user styles. I did these for fun and to share with other MeFites for personal use. If you like any of these user styles or scripts, please consider donating directly to MetaFilter. If you run into an issue with any user styles I've posted, send MeFi mail to me or message me here (I'm not sure if I'll get notifications for comments in the Feedback section). I'll try to answer when I get a chance. If it turns out to be a fix that requires a lot of research/testing (I'm not a programmer), then it'll probably have to happen when I get extended free time (e.g. a holiday). - rangefinder 1.4

additional_info: This is the user style version of my Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey user script of the same name. They both accomplish the same thing. I made this for people who can't install user scripts but can install user styles. More details and screenshots here on the corresponding script page: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/1527-metafilter-recent-activity-border-o-rainbows The screenshots here are mockup comments on the Classic theme; the style also works on the Modern, Modern Dark, and Plain themes. Version 2.1 (* note: this is actually the first public release of the user style. The versioning starts at 2.1, to match the version of the user script on which it's based) As of 2016-08-21: Tested to be working in Firefox and Chrome. Should work for all official MeFi themes (Modern, Modern Dark, Classic, Plain). Credits * This user script/style was inspired by a MetaTalk comment from phunniemee: http://metatalk.metafilter.com/22732/A-Pony-with-a-Green-Check-Cutie-Mark#1094368 * The original rainbow cloud graphic is from a clip art library I got in the mid-1990s.
